alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Denton County through 730 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bartonville, or near Trophy Club, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denton, Flower Mound, Southlake, Corinth, Highland Village, Trophy Club, Lake Dallas, Little Elm, Roanoke, Argyle, Hickory Creek, Double Oak, Shady Shores, Northlake, Bartonville, Copper Canyon, Corral City, Oak Point, Lakewood Village and Marshall Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 near mile marker 468. Interstate 35W between mile markers 73 and 85. Interstate 35E between mile markers 455 and 466. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
